name: NobleBirds
description:
Controls

  • ZQSD to move (this is a french game ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) )
  • Space to shoot

There are 5 bonuses : life gain, shield, damage multiplier, weapons upgrade and score bonus. A boss comes in sometimes, stronger and faster, and at some point the game should crash under the number of enemies on screen.

Wait, why?

I ran totaly broke in the last few weeks before this 2014 christmas. So I made a game for my whole family to play and enjoy!

Yes, this is the painter's christmas painting story all over again
